name: Kesavan
summary: Experienced software engineer with a passion for developing innovative solutions. Skilled in full-stack web development, with expertise in JavaScript, Python, and various frameworks.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

responsibilities: Developed and maintained web applications using AngularJS, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features.
Participated in code reviews and provided constructive feedback to peers.
Investigated and resolved bugs and performance issues to ensure product stability.
Mentored junior developers, providing guidance on best practices and coding standards.
